Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.observers

Interface ViewObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientController
public interface ViewObserver
Custom observer interface for views. It supports different types of notification.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onUpdateActionChoice(String choice)
    Sends to the server a String that contains the client's choice between playing a Character Card or moving a student (this choice is only possible in Expert Mode).
    void
    onUpdateAssistantCard(String assistantCard)
    Sends to the server the Assistant Card the client wishes to play.
    void
    onUpdateCharacterCard(int characterCardID)
    Sends to the server the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to play.
    void
    onUpdateCharacterCardArrayListString(int characterCardID, ArrayList<String> list)
    Sends to the server the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to use, as well as the list of String parameter required.
    void
    onUpdateCharacterCardInt(int characterCardID, int par)
    Sends to the server the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to use, as well as the int parameter required.
    void
    onUpdateCharacterCardString(int characterCardID, String par)
    Sends to the server the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to use, as well as the String parameter required.
    void
    onUpdateCharacterCardStringInt(int characterCardID, String par1, int par2)
    Sends to the server the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to use, as well as the String and the int parameters required.
    void
    onUpdateCloudChoice(int cloudID)
    Sends to the server the ID of the cloud the client wishes to take students from.
    void
    onUpdateCreateOrJoin(String choice)
    Based on the client's choice, asks for the game parameters (if the choice is "CREATE") or asks for an existing game number (if the choice is "JOIN").
    void
    onUpdateGameInfo(int gameNumber, boolean mode, int numOfPlayers)
    Sends to the server the game parameters chosen by the client, so that it can build the desired game.
    void
    onUpdateGameNumber(int gameNumber)
    Sends to the server the ID of the game the client wishes to join.
    void
    onUpdateIslandStudentMove(String color, int islandID)
    Sends to the server the color of the student the client wishes to move, as well as the ID of the island the client wishes to move it onto.
    void
    onUpdateMotherNatureSteps(int steps)
    Sends to the server the number of steps the client wishes Mother Nature to move of.
    void
    onUpdateNickname(String nickname)
    Sends to the server a login request with the chosen nickname.
    void
    onUpdateServerData(String address, int port)
    Creates a new connection to the server with the updated info.
    void
    onUpdateTableStudentMove(String color)
    Sends to the server the color of the student the client wishes to move to its table.
    void
    onUpdateWizardID(String wizardID)
    Sends to the server the Wizard ID the client wishes to embody for that game.

  • Method Details

    • onUpdateServerData

      void onUpdateServerData(String address, int port)
      Creates a new connection to the server with the updated info.
      Parameters:
      address - server address.
      port - server port.

    • onUpdateNickname

      void onUpdateNickname(String nickname)
      Sends to the server a login request with the chosen nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname the client wants to (try to) login with.

    • onUpdateCreateOrJoin

      void onUpdateCreateOrJoin(String choice)
      Based on the client's choice, asks for the game parameters (if the choice is "CREATE") or asks for an existing game number (if the choice is "JOIN").
      Parameters:
      choice - the choice made by the client.

    • onUpdateGameInfo

      void onUpdateGameInfo(int gameNumber, boolean mode, int numOfPlayers)
      Sends to the server the game parameters chosen by the client, so that it can build the desired game.
      Parameters:
      gameNumber - the ID of the game the client wishes to create.
      mode - the game mode of the game the client wishes to create (false -> NORMAL, true -> EXPERT).
      numOfPlayers - the maximum number of players of the game the client wishes to create.

    • onUpdateGameNumber

      void onUpdateGameNumber(int gameNumber)
      Sends to the server the ID of the game the client wishes to join.
      Parameters:
      gameNumber - the ID of the game the client wishes to join.

    • onUpdateWizardID

      void onUpdateWizardID(String wizardID)
      Sends to the server the Wizard ID the client wishes to embody for that game.
      Parameters:
      wizardID - the String representing the WizardID the client wishes to embody.

    • onUpdateAssistantCard

      void onUpdateAssistantCard(String assistantCard)
      Sends to the server the Assistant Card the client wishes to play.
      Parameters:
      assistantCard - the Assistant Card the client wishes to play.

    • onUpdateIslandStudentMove

      void onUpdateIslandStudentMove(String color, int islandID)
      Sends to the server the color of the student the client wishes to move, as well as the ID of the island the client wishes to move it onto.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the student the client wishes to move.
      islandID - the ID of the island the client wishes to move the student onto.

    • onUpdateTableStudentMove

      void onUpdateTableStudentMove(String color)
      Sends to the server the color of the student the client wishes to move to its table.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the student the client wishes to move to its table.

    • onUpdateMotherNatureSteps

      void onUpdateMotherNatureSteps(int steps)
      Sends to the server the number of steps the client wishes Mother Nature to move of.
      Parameters:
      steps - the steps the client wishes Mother Nature to move of.

    • onUpdateCloudChoice

      void onUpdateCloudChoice(int cloudID)
      Sends to the server the ID of the cloud the client wishes to take students from.
      Parameters:
      cloudID - the ID of the cloud the client wishes to take students from.

    • onUpdateCharacterCard

      void onUpdateCharacterCard(int characterCardID)
      Sends to the server the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to play. Note that this method is called if no parameters are required.
      Parameters:
      characterCardID - the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to play.

    • onUpdateCharacterCardInt

      void onUpdateCharacterCardInt(int characterCardID, int par)
      Sends to the server the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to use, as well as the int parameter required.
      Parameters:
      characterCardID - the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to play.
      par - the required int parameter (its meaning changes from card to card).

    • onUpdateCharacterCardString

      void onUpdateCharacterCardString(int characterCardID, String par)
      Sends to the server the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to use, as well as the String parameter required.
      Parameters:
      characterCardID - the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to play.
      par - the required String parameter (its meaning changes from card to card).

    • onUpdateCharacterCardStringInt

      void onUpdateCharacterCardStringInt(int characterCardID, String par1, int par2)
      Sends to the server the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to use, as well as the String and the int parameters required.
      Parameters:
      characterCardID - the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to play.
      par1 - the required String parameter.
      par2 - the required int parameter.

    • onUpdateCharacterCardArrayListString

      void onUpdateCharacterCardArrayListString(int characterCardID, ArrayList<String> list)
      Sends to the server the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to use, as well as the list of String parameter required.
      Parameters:
      characterCardID - the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to play.
      list - the required list of String parameters (its meaning changes from card to card).

    • onUpdateActionChoice

      void onUpdateActionChoice(String choice)
      Sends to the server a String that contains the client's choice between playing a Character Card or moving a student (this choice is only possible in Expert Mode).
      Parameters:
      choice - the choice made by the client.
